document_data.name: Jurnau Halbeck
document_data.mainbody: '''Jurnau Halbeck''' was a [[dwarf]] auctioneer in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.Description: Jurnau had a twin-forked braided russet brown beard. He wore a long vest over a white tunic at work.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Jurnau joined the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|forward camp]] outside the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]], alongside their [[drow]], [[human]], and [[gnome]] allies. Once there, Jurnau set up a simple hut for the storage of goods and went about arranging deals between the various soldiers, [[pilgrim]]s, and [[adventurer]]s who passed through the camp.
